phrases: Even though that is not something you bet on...
That is why she is part of Sabertooth!
Does that Yukino chick have all her marbles?
Even though her opponent is Kagura, the strongest wizard of Mermaid Heel,
it seems she is got confidence to spare.
If you are sincerely prepared to do this,
then accepting it is the proper thing to do.
They bet their lives, so whoever loses dies, right?!
Well, things have taken a serious turn.
Just what is going on here?!
I set up a good match if I do say so myself.
This should be a lively battle.
It is your bad luck to be standing before a member of Sabertooth.
That girl is a Celestial Spirit Wizard?!
One of those 12 Zodiac Gate things?
Gate of the Fish, I open thee.
I like the sound of that!
What kind of Celestial Spirit is it?
I do not think it was in the Celestial Spirit World when we visited.
Going by the usual pattern, it is probably something like this.
But there are ones like the Gemini twins too,
so my guess is it will be like this.
I have a feeling you have hit the mark...
That is not even a fish...
Wendy, do not waste your time contradicting that guy.
She is dodging their attacks with just the slightest movements.
All she is doing is dodging.
It is not wise to underestimate Mermaid Heel's strongest wizard.
This looks like it is going to quickly become a fine magic battle.
She is deftly dodging Pisces' fierce attacks!
Why is she escaping the fish?
All she has to do is eat it...
If you are so good at dodging, then all I need to do is ground you.
Two gates open at the same time?!
That is one of the 12 Zodiac Gates, too!
Gate of the Scales, I open thee.
She is a sight for sore eyes!
That Libra character can use the same magic as me?!
She blew off Libra's gravity power?!
Make the target's gravity go sideways.
She was only able to escape the Celestial Spirit's gravity altering for a short time!
Kagura is pinned to the statue!
This is what I am talkin' about!
The highlight of two gates open at once!
I guess it is all over...
Or I wish it would be...
Do not tell me she can use gravity magic too?!
Kagura's the one who taught me gravity-altering magic.
This is the epitome of the Grand Magic Games!
Kagura is undaunted by two Celestial Spirits!
This is amazing, is not it, Yajima-san?
I am so excited about getting to see a showdown like this right before my eyes!
Yukino's going to bring out her real power now.
You are going to make me open...
Is that what she just said?!
There are 12 Zodiac Gates and hence 12 keys...
But I have heard rumors of a 13th key...
That means you are out of luck.
I have not relied on luck since the moment I was born.
Everything has come about through choices that I have made!
Gate of the Serpent Bearer, I open thee!
That is what is leading me to the future!
I did not know a Celestial Spirit like this existed!
The thing itself is a serpent!
Not only are there two Celestial Spirit Wizards here, but they both own the 12 Zodiac Gates.
You really would not want Kagura-chan to unsheathe her sword.
The winner is Kagura Mikazuchi of Mermaid Heel!
I knew Kagura-chan could do it!
Told you not to underestimate Kagura!
That Celestial Spirit Wizard is powerful in her own right, but Kagura is just too tough.
It is unbelievable, but Sabertooth got zero points on the second day!
Or was the Mermaid woman strong?
I did not know somebody like her existed...
And thus ends the second day of the Grand Magic Games!
Tail gained ten points today, giving them first place with 36 points!
but their 20 points from yesterday keeps them in second place!
Likewise, Lamia Scale is tied in second with 20 points!
And Mermaid Heel is moving up.
They gained ten points, putting them in fourth place with 19 points.
In fifth place, one rank down, is Blue Pegasus with 17 points!
And in sixth place, one rank down for them, Quatro Puppy!
Our guild name has become Quatro Puppy...
A promise was made between two men.
I am going to drink again tonight!
And gaining ten points each, but still tied in last place, are Fairy Tail A Team
and Fairy Tail B Team, both with 12 points!
What kind of battles are in store for us tomorrow, the third day of the tournament?!
Those were some fine magic battles.
Now the project is even more certain to succeed.
I have to do something quickly...
Even though the second day is over, I have not sensed the magic power that I perceive every year.
The second day of the Grand Magic Games ended.
Five more days until that fateful day...
You do not sense the magic power?
The power that was similar to Zeref's, that we felt every year...
I have not sensed it this time, not yet.
I can think of many possibilities.
If it came from a person,
maybe they are not in Crocus this time.
Or maybe they are in Crocus, but not using the power.
It is also possible that they are a contestant in the Games, but have not participated yet.
If that magic is from some kind of device or a set location,
perhaps the device is not in operation,
or there is some sort of filter that keeps the magic from leaking outside.
At any rate, as long as you do not sense that dangerous power, nothing should happen.
Maybe I will check out the organizers from tomorrow.
Do not do anything to stand out.
And try not to get yourself killed.
I never thought the day would come when we could talk normally like this.
Is the dinner party over already?
Are Sho and Wally in the same guild?
I hear from them once in a while.
It really is great to see you, Millianna.
I am so happy to see you doing well.
We better start headin' back to the inn.
Now that you mention it, she is late...
She mentioned having something to do.
Nothing a good night's sleep cannot fix!
That guy's name is Elfman, yeah?
Give him a message for me.
Tell him it was a wild battle...
An' I am lookin' forward to going up against him again during the tournament.
I want to fight you myself.
We are going to beat you again next time, too!
By the way, where is Gramps?
He was having a drinking contest with Bacchus-san...
He is probably on the floor over there.
I was thinking about Saber's Celestial Spirit Wizard...
Yukino-san, I think her name is, right?
The 12 Zodiac Gates and the 13th one... I think?
They said they bet their lives, so I was wondering what is going to happen now...
Even though we are in no position to be worried about other people...
We have still got three days left!
First, we need to focus on winning and do our best!
This looks like it is going to be a pain...
This is Crocus Garden, the inn where Sabertooth is staying.
It is so pitiful that I cannot even cry, you scum.
Remember why we are the top wizard guild.
Do not look at the insects around you.
Our eyes are on something far greater.
This man is Sabertooth's master, Gemma.
I will give you just one more chance.
Do not you ever make such a pathetic scene again.
I swear that I will measure up to your expectations.
I lost to the member of another guild.
That is not what I am talking about!
You wagered your life and lost, and not only that, the enemy took pity on you!
I will submit to any punishment.
I will do exactly as you say.
And so ended the second day of the Grand Magic Games.
Somehow, Fairy Tail emerged as a contender, even while staying in last place,
but on the underside of the spectacular festival,
something most of them never dreamed of was slowly set into motion.
Who is going to pay a visit now?
How the hell would I know?
Then I will give you a hint.
What are those white crystals that fall from the sky in winter?
What is the opposite of yes?
If you put'them together, you will pretty much have the answer!
Next time: Grudges Are Wrapped in the Silence of the Night!
Natsu, you know who it is but you are saying it weird on purpose!
